price: 98. Mas glorifica a tu Señor con alabanzas y sé de quienes se postran ante Él.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
